persona.name: Ellis
persona.bio: Ellis, a 53-year-old full-time crypto trader, is known for their independent and patient approach to navigating the volatile world of digital currencies. With years of experience and a frugal mindset, Ellis meticulously analyzes market trends and invests wisely, focusing on long-term gains rather than quick profits. Their expert knowledge and disciplined strategy have earned them a reputation as a prudent and successful investor in the crypto community.
